name: Lost and Found
description:
I’m a kind of person who easily intrigued by random things. Mostly by its random but fits by my standard. Sometimes when I talk, my eyes turn and lock into the void, it’s me seeing that composition.

And one of the things that intrigued me, is a shattered glass. So many reflection, but shattered all over the place. And in my mind, I’m guessing that’s probably how insects precieve things.

And the reminds me, back in high school, I have a room that used to be rented. There is a mirror, it shattered. And it is painted black. I kept looking at it as if I had a painting my room by some maestro. Now that I’m looking back, this thought has come up: I wonder how much the person hate themselves to brought themselves to do such thing?

I might be wrong and I would never know. And I wish that glass can talk. But it’s too late know, even the building is gone, replaced.

The only thing remains is the memory and the effort to put down the thought in a writing and drawing.

But, this is what existential question and the answer to it. We are all going away, sooner or later. We are all being replaced, but there will be someone that will try to find out, then they may understand.

Or was it me, all along?
